website_summaries.verdict: This keyed plastic box is rated waterproof for 30 minutes in up to one meter of water.
pros: Made dust-proof and water tight with elastomer seal
Rated waterproof for 30 minutes at 1 meter
Seals with a twist latch and keyed plastic lock
Internal dimensions measure 8.41 inches by 4.41 inches by 2.3 inches
Fits smart phones, keys, thumb drives, hard drives
cons: Some expected — and wanted — it to be bigger

website_summaries.verdict: This mini-dry box comes with a key for opening and a lining to help protect your items.
pros: Rubber padding helps keep the box watertight
Works well at keeping your items dry
Able to fit a smartphone and car keys at the same time
Rubber netting helps to hold down your items
cons: While this does have molded holes for a carabiner, it does not come with one

customer_reviews.title: It's works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Smell proof and not overly bulky. The webbing on the top helps hold my tobacco pouch and an extra lighter. I was able to get a small piece of pluck-n-pull foam that fits inside to secure my pipe and grinder from rolling around. I recommend this case to anyone who asks about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Perez

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, keeps dust and moisture out, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This case is a very durable, strong and reliable way to keep out dust and moisture and unwanted damage to some of your more delicate possessions. I ordered it because I have some valuable books which are old, printed on a delicate and unique paper. I needed a case I could put them in to store and transport them. I needed the case to be rainproof, hold the books in place and be something I could take with me and not have to worry about the way I handled it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid. I have not water tested it yet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid. I have not water tested it yet, but I will this summer on the river. It is a little heavy, but no surprise really. Itt would have been cool if it came with a good strap, but it does allow me to add one, I will find a strap soon enough. I also wonder if it floats, but I doubt it, it is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boxes, good quality for the price. Keeps your items safe and free from moisture. Please do not use these for SIlver storage, as they have a fully rubber insert. Rubber contains sulfur, which causes real Silver to tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: John McClane

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a few cigars when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great case for a few cigars when traveling. Sturdy and the material seems to be of great quality at great price!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Durable and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to keep items in while camping,hiking,kayaking and holds up great. The padding keeps items quiet and the holder on the cover is perfect for cash holding cash
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to figure out how it opponents no instructions on how it open but it is open after you figure it out how to unlock it
customer_reviews.author: tony loyd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case I love this thing it's airtight no smells ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case I love this thing it's airtight no smells go out no water goes in my opinion is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: seres

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Definetly plan on purchasing more
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definetly plan on purchasing more. I love that it is so airtight, you can hear the air being let go upon opening the case.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding box I love it GREAT Thanks
customer_reviews.author: J McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Awsome case
customer_reviews.text: This little case awsome ive droped it many times still like new and no smell comes out or water goes in so siked to have this
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Over all quality of the box is great just wish it was slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was extremely fast! Over all quality of the box is great just wish it was slightly bigger!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is advertised. Great quality and Im probably going to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Travel humidor
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a mini humidor, it's perfect for the purpose. I added a humidifier tube for the cigars, and might add some wood chips too, but it's great to hold 10 or so cigars, plus cutter, lighter and humidifier tube.
customer_reviews.author: LemonHoneyTea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Awesome hard case and perfect size! Lock holds well and closer snap is firm. Rubber egg shape protection inside and on sides. Couldn’t have needed anything better. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daley

customer_reviews.title: Close
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to house my GPD pocket 2. Even though the dimensions advertised should have fit the device perfectly for some reason it only fit at the very slightest of angles leaning against the front. And I had to completely remove the rubberized padding inside which would’ve been nice to have considering it was housing an electron it device. I’m not very happy with it for housing that computer. But the dimensions were cutting it a little close. But it still should’ve fot. I am going to keep the item and use it to has other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lock doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this partly for the locking feature. I lock the container with the keys and the lock is still easily turned and opened with my fingers. Might as well be no lock... Maybe it helps with having one more step to open but by no means a secure lock. The container is also pretty small. However if youre looking for something smaller this is good. The quality of the matetials used in this container is not bad. Just wish it can lock like it promised.
customer_reviews.author: JP

product_meta.title: Seahorse 56 Micro Case, Black (SE56, BK)
product_meta.description: Seahorse Protective Cases keeps your valuable equipment safe. Close and latch your Seahorse cases to automatically safely seal your gear against water, air and dust. Lifetime guarantee, made in the USA.
feature_bullets: External Dimensions: 9.48" x 5.8" x 2.77". Internal Dimensions: 8.41" x 4.41" x 2.3". Weight: 1.31 lbs. Made of high impact resistant polycarbonate.
Elastomer seal makes our case watertight and dust proof. Rated IP 67 (30 minutes at 1 meter).
Twist latch with keyed plastic lock to secure your valuables.
2" strap attachment points on each end, rust proof hinges, molded in hole to put your own carabiner (not included).
Padded liner tray for added shock absorbency. Removable rubber mesh lid web for extra storage. Made in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
